ygData.subject: Re: Pixies
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure if you consider a 24th level Wizard senior.. in any case, I have not run into the problem you have mentioned and I have killed a few pixies in my
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure if you consider a 24th level Wizard senior.. in any case, I have not run into the problem you have mentioned and I have killed a few pixies in my time.

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Arcius [SMTP:tomaaas@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 1:59 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Pixies

From: Arcius <tomaaas@...>


I have recently heard from another young Wizard that
Pixies should not be killed by us. She claimed that
some of the higher level spells can be purchased only
from Pixies. Since I have killed a fair share of Pixie
Tricksters and Pranksters (both of whom lower faction
standing with Pixie) as part of a Ranger Quest, I
wanted to know if any of the more senior Wizards in
this group could comment on this concern?

I also wanted to find out if there are any Wizards
here from Rodcet Nife - most of the posts seem to come
from the 'elder' servers.

Thanks,
Arcius
3rd circle Wizard
Rodcet Nife
